${ModID}:Ectostasis.NAME: Ectostasis
${ModID}:Ectostasis.DESCRIPTION: When this card enters your discard pile, gain !M! Block. NL ${ModID}:Reverb.

${ModID}:BingBong.NAME: BING BONG
${ModID}:BingBong.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Toll a bell. NL Discard a random card. NL ${ModID}:Reverb.
${ModID}:BingBong.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Toll a bell. NL Discard a card. NL ${ModID}:Reverb.

${ModID}:BloodMoon.NAME: Blood Moon
${ModID}:BloodMoon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the damage of the ${ModID}:Crimson_Bell by !M! this combat.

${ModID}:GhostlyGrasp.NAME: Ghostly Grasp
${ModID}:GhostlyGrasp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the ${ModID}:Frozen_Bell is ringing, apply !M! Weak.

${ModID}:FeedTheAbyss.NAME: Feed the Abyss
${ModID}:FeedTheAbyss.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! cards from your draw pile into your discard pile. NL They cost 0 until played.

${ModID}:GhostlyRiot.NAME: Ghostly Riot
${ModID}:GhostlyRiot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL If the ${ModID}:Steel_Bell is ringing, Increase its power by 2 this combat.

${ModID}:SpitefulBlow.NAME: Spiteful Blow
${ModID}:SpitefulBlow.DESCRIPTION: Only playable if this entered your discard pile this turn. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Reverb.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: This card needs to enter my discard pile first!

${ModID}:OneForNothing.NAME: One for Nothing
${ModID}:OneForNothing.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand and draw pile. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:OneForNothing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Discard your hand and draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:HammerDown.NAME: Hammer Down
${ModID}:HammerDown.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Whenever you ${ModID}:Toll the ${ModID}:Steel_Bell, return this from your discard pile to your hand.

${ModID}:Lament.NAME: Lament
${ModID}:Lament.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Increase the power of your bells by !M! this turn. NL ${ModID}:Reverb.

${ModID}:Cacophony.NAME: Cacophony
${ModID}:Cacophony.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you ${ModID}:Toll a bell, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:EerieLaughter.NAME: Eerie Laughter
${ModID}:EerieLaughter.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:TheBigBang.NAME: The Big Bang
${ModID}:TheBigBang.DESCRIPTION: Replace a bell with the ${ModID}:Big_Bang for !M! ${ModID}:Tolls.

${ModID}:Incorporeal.NAME: Incorporeal
${ModID}:Incorporeal.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block. NL At the start of your turn, discard a card.

${ModID}:SpectralBlast.NAME: Spectral Blast
${ModID}:SpectralBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! ${ModID}:Haunted to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Torment.NAME: Torment
${ModID}:Torment.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! ${ModID}:Haunted to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Miasma.NAME: Miasma
${ModID}:Miasma.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each unique debuff on the enemy.

${ModID}:Rummage.NAME: Rummage
${ModID}:Rummage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put one of the top !M! cards from your draw pile into your hand. Discard the others.

${ModID}:Malice.NAME: Malice
${ModID}:Malice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Whenever the enemy loses HP, it loses !M! more.

${ModID}:Raze.NAME: Raze
${ModID}:Raze.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times.

${ModID}:MidnightToll.NAME: Midnight Toll
${ModID}:MidnightToll.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Toll a Bell. NL Put !M! card containing "Ghostly" from your draw pile into your hand.
${ModID}:MidnightToll.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Toll a Bell. NL Put !M! cards containing "Ghostly" from your draw pile into your hand.

${ModID}:GhostlyBite.NAME: Ghostly Bite
${ModID}:GhostlyBite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the ${ModID}:Crimson_Bell is ringing, heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:GhostlyMist.NAME: Ghostly Mist
${ModID}:GhostlyMist.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If the ${ModID}:Nimbus_Bell is ringing, draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:GhostlyWave.NAME: Ghostly Wave
${ModID}:GhostlyWave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you ${ModID}:Tolled a bell this turn, gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:Vortex.NAME: Vortex
${ModID}:Vortex.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Draw !M! cards. NL ${ModID}:Reverb.

${ModID}:BellsOfDoom.NAME: Bells of Doom
${ModID}:BellsOfDoom.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each ${ModID}:Toll this combat.

${ModID}:ResoundingBlows.NAME: Resounding Blows
${ModID}:ResoundingBlows.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack, increase the power of your bells by !M! this turn.

${ModID}:FeastOnFear.NAME: Feast on Fear
${ModID}:FeastOnFear.DESCRIPTION: Remove up to !M! ${ModID}:Haunted. NL Gain that much Energy.
${ModID}:FeastOnFear.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Trigger up to !M! ${ModID}:Haunted. NL Gain that much Energy.

${ModID}:Mischief.NAME: Mischief
${ModID}:Mischief.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to each ${ModID}:Haunted enemy.

${ModID}:HowlingStorm.NAME: Howling Storm
${ModID}:HowlingStorm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${ModID}:Harmony. NL Add !M! charges to the ${ModID}:Nimbus_Bell.

${ModID}:SweepingHammer.NAME: Sweeping Hammer
${ModID}:SweepingHammer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL ${ModID}:Toll a bell.

${ModID}:EchoingToll.NAME: Echoing Toll
${ModID}:EchoingToll.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Toll a bell. NL Repeat its effect X times.
${ModID}:EchoingToll.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Toll a bell. NL Repeat its effect X + 1 times.

${ModID}:OnBeat.NAME: On Beat
${ModID}:OnBeat.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Toll a bell. NL If this consumes ${ModID}:Harmony, ${ModID}:Toll another bell.

${ModID}:StrikeFromBeyond.NAME: Strike from Beyond
${ModID}:StrikeFromBeyond.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each card that entered the discard pile this turn.

${ModID}:Nostalgia.NAME: Nostalgia
${ModID}:Nostalgia.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! card you did not play this turn from your discard pile into your hand.
${ModID}:Nostalgia.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put !M! card you did not play this turn from your discard pile into your hand. NL ${ModID}:Reverb.

${ModID}:HeartAttack.NAME: Heart Attack
${ModID}:HeartAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you apply a debuff, increase this cards damage by !M! until played.

${ModID}:PhantomPlague.NAME: Phantom Plague
${ModID}:PhantomPlague.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a different debuff, also apply !M! ${ModID}:Haunted.

${ModID}:SymphonyOfChimes.NAME: Symphony of Chimes
${ModID}:SymphonyOfChimes.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, ${ModID}:Toll a bell.

${ModID}:EldritchWhispers.NAME: Eldritch Whispers
${ModID}:EldritchWhispers.DESCRIPTION: Whenever ${ModID}:Reverb triggers on a card, reduce its cost to 0 until played.

${ModID}:Jumpscare.NAME: Jumpscare
${ModID}:Jumpscare.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Haunted. NL The enemy loses !M! Strength this turn.

${ModID}:ChillTouch.NAME: Chill Touch
${ModID}:ChillTouch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The ${ModID}:Frozen_Bell grants !M! additional Block on the next ${ModID}:Toll.

${ModID}:Necrosis.NAME: Necrosis
${ModID}:Necrosis.DESCRIPTION: Whenever the enemy attacks, it loses !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Melodrama.NAME: Melodrama
${ModID}:Melodrama.DESCRIPTION: Increase the power of your bells by !M! this combat. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Polish.NAME: Polish
${ModID}:Polish.DESCRIPTION: Increase the power of a bell by !M! this combat.

${ModID}:SoulHarvest.NAME: Soul Harvest
${ModID}:SoulHarvest.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is ${ModID}:Haunted, draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:Bloodshed.NAME: Bloodshed
${ModID}:Bloodshed.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Your next attack deals !M! additional damage.

${ModID}:GhostlyMayhem.NAME: Ghostly Mayhem
${ModID}:GhostlyMayhem.DESCRIPTION: Play the top card of your draw pile. Repeat for each ${ModID}:Toll this turn.

${ModID}:DarkSkies.NAME: Dark Skies
${ModID}:DarkSkies.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each card in your hand.

${ModID}:Paranormal.NAME: Paranormal
${ModID}:Paranormal.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain [E] and discard a card.
${ModID}:Paranormal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E] and discard a card.

${ModID}:GateToHades.NAME: Gate to Hades
${ModID}:GateToHades.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL For each other card in your hand, lose !M! HP.

${ModID}:ShroudInDarkness.NAME: Shroud in Darkness
${ModID}:ShroudInDarkness.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL When this card enters your discard pile, NL apply !M! ${ModID}:Haunted to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:CloakSweep.NAME: Cloak Sweep
${ModID}:CloakSweep.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. Draw !M! card. NL ${ModID}:Reverb.

${ModID}:PainAndSorrow.NAME: Pain and Sorrow
${ModID}:PainAndSorrow.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you ${ModID}:Toll the ${ModID}:Crimson_Bell, repeat its effect !M! time.
${ModID}:PainAndSorrow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you ${ModID}:Toll the ${ModID}:Crimson_Bell, repeat its effect !M! time.

${ModID}:GrimDirge.NAME: Grim Dirge
${ModID}:GrimDirge.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Haunted to ALL enemies. Enemies lose !M! more HP from ${ModID}:Haunted this combat.

${ModID}:CrimsonBloom.NAME: Crimson Bloom
${ModID}:CrimsonBloom.DESCRIPTION: Increase the damage of the ${ModID}:Crimson_Bell by !M! this combat.

${ModID}:GargoyleForm.NAME: Gargoyle Form
${ModID}:GargoyleForm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff, your next attack deals !M! additional damage.
